title: [HOLD for payment 2023-11-22] [$500] Chat - App does not replace # on selection of mention
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Precondition: User should know a user with # in display name
1. Open the app
2. Open any report
3. Write '@#' and select the user in result
4. Observe that app does not replace # with result

Expected result: On selecting user from mention result, app should replace search term with result

Actual result: None
